title: What's The Counterplay To Warwick And Malzahar's Ultimate?
body: The only information Lolcounter.com can give me is buying {{item:3102}}, but it has a 40 second cooldown and can be popped by his other abilities.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-24T05:12:03.852+0000)
>
> {{item:3140}}

Last game had a zed get a qqs, guess what happened when the malzhar ulted?

>
> Last game had a zed get a qqs, guess what happened when the malzhar ulted?

So they madeit so the only thing that stops suppression is banshees lol. GJ RIOT
QSS
QSS doesn't stop suppresses.

You're thinking of cleanse.
Yeah it does.
Have your Alistar press Q or W

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-04-24T09:29:45.247+0000)
>
> Have your Garen press Q

What if it is Malz ulting Ali and WW ulting Garen while leblanc is bitching about no more silence the Riven went AFK and your Cait did not take a single level in traps for some reason?

> [{quoted}](name=Irelia Bot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-24T09:38:37.862+0000)
>
> What if it is Malz ulting Ali and WW ulting Garen while leblanc is bitching about no more silence the Riven went AFK and your Cait did not take a single level in traps for some reason?

Have LeBlanc burst Malzahar down during his channel while Garen lols as Warwick's ult takes him from a full 100% health to a dangerously low 87% health, report Riven for going afk and contemplate why you mentioned Caitlyn since her traps are not particularly relevant in this situation.

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-24T09:43:56.835+0000)
>
> Have LeBlanc burst Malzahar down during his channel while Garen lols as Warwick's ult takes him from a full 100% health to a dangerously low 87% health, report Riven for going afk and contemplate why you mentioned Caitlyn since her traps are not particularly relevant in this situation.

But what if this is non damage support Leblanc?

> [{quoted}](name=Irelia Bot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=000500000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-24T15:30:01.804+0000)
>
> But what if this is non damage support Leblanc?

Then they get what they deserve.

{{champion:117}}
{{item:3222}}
Those work fine, it's just tenacity that doesn't affect it.

> [{quoted}](name=GaleWinUnleashed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-04-24T05:05:53.370+0000)
>
> Those work fine, it's just tenacity that doesn't affect it.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Mikael's_Crucible
Mikael's does not work.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/R8IzYt9i-qss-mercurial-change-for-69
New QSS still works on suppressions.

Malzahar and Warwick's ults are supposed to take advantage of lone or mislocated champions. For Warwick who is a jungler, keep your side of the map warded so he can't surprise you during the laning phase and then just stick with your team during the teamfight phase and his ult can be knocked off of you. For Malzahar who's a laner, the same advice is true for the teamfight phase, but the laning phase is tricky as it's a bit more 1 on 1. The real trick is to stay away from him until your jungler shows up for a gank and then see if you can bait him into using it and getting punished by a gank.

Of course if you're team didn't bring any silences, stuns, knock ups, or knock backs, you're just as screwed as being against a Yi with no hard CC.

Current patch: {{item:3140}} 
Next patch: GG

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KEkZVWzE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-04-24T09:18:37.932+0000)
>
> Current patch: {{item:3140}} 
> Next patch: GG

It is a CC debuff so it should still work once 6.9 hits However if you are trying to stop the malz ult damage you have to run away after using this active.

Stay out of their range, or at least don't be in a position where they can ult you without getting immediately destroyed by your team.

Banshee's Veil and QSS aren't actually counterplay, they're just counters.
Doesn't QSS cleanse the lock down but you still take the dmg?

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
QSS is the counter play.

Not hard.
Hopefully there is a CC class to knock them up, stun, or silence.
